head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Man Shot To Death

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Man Shot To Death

body.head.byline: By JENNIFER 8. LEE; Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: A 26-year-old man was fatally shot about 5:30 p.m. yesterday on Fulton Avenue near East 172nd Street, the police said. The man, who was shot several times, including once in the head, was taken to St. Barnabas Hospital in critical condition and later pronounced dead. The police did not release his identity. No arrests had been made.
